2. Room Selection

THE KIN

Sleeps two in a single bunk. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $79.

Subtotal: $158

THE CLASSMATES

Sleeps four in two cozy bunk beds. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $89.

Subtotal: $158

THE PATRON

Features one full sized bed. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $99.

Subtotal: $158

THE MATES

Features one queen sized bed. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $109.

Subtotal: $158

THE GANG

Features two queen size beds. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $119.

Subtotal: $158

THE KING

Features one king size bed. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $129.

Subtotal: $158

THE KING (ADA Compliant)

Features one king size bed. Wheelchair accessible. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $129.

Subtotal: $158

THE GUARDIAN SUITE

Features one King sized bed and additional sleeping for one. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $139.

Subtotal: $158

THE HEIGHTS

Features four connected guest rooms, 2 King suites and 2 Queen Rooms located on the top floor of the hotel. Free WiFi. Flat screen TV. Glass rainshower. Unique art & antiques. In-room water & treats available for purchase. Starting at $149 per room.

To Book the Heights please call 401-455-3326
